attributes.action: Give PM Boris Johnson a Knighthood!
attributes.additional_details: Since taking office Boris Johnson has dealt with two events unseen by Britain before. Firstly, he had to unite Britain and resolve Brexit, something two of his predecessors failed to do. Secondly, the Covid-19 pandemic in which he has been amazing. He has taken every step asked of the people. Given financial help like never before and is also fighting the virus himself. He is seeing us through some of the toughest times in Britain's history.
attributes.background: Nominate PM Boris Johnson for a Knighthood to be made a Sir.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
